sub_title: Senior SAP EWM Consultant/Lead - with unique experience of its integration with MFS, WI, YL, TM, and SAP S/4.
summary:
Zain is a spontaneous and experienced senior consultant with a strong affinity with Supply Chain Management, and a rare combination of in-depth knowledge of Warehousing & Transportation (SAP EWM / SAP YL / SAP WI), Manufacturing (SAP PP-PI / MM) as well as Distribution (SAP SD / LE) in S/4.

He has nearly eleven years of extensive experience in multiple implementations, of which nine are with SAP EWM, both decentral and in S/4. Above that, he was essential in giving multiple advisory services to various customers. As a result, gaining broad knowledge in logistical processes on top of the strong functional and technical skills. 

When looking at him personally, his strong affinity with SCM is visible in his day-to-day life. His personality and global background enables him to closely engage with different key players within an organization! Combining all this, he has proven to be able to design and deliver the most complex business scenarios into the most efficient and eloquent solutions fit to the customer’s needs.

profile_positions.description:

•	Integration with production for receiving HUs and Cross-Docking to Automated Loading bays and alternatively to the high bay (cranes).

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Paper & tissue manufacturer | EWM Architect - Advisory for multiple SAP S/4 EWM implementations

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Multi-Industry Company | Advisory services for SAP EWM S/4
High-Tech Customer Project | Senior EWM consultant at the new warehouse project on EWM 9.5

profile_positions.description:
For a new €200 million-warehouse, decentral SAP EWM 9.5 was implemented. The warehouse consisted of multiple ASRS solutions, multistep complex goods movement flows with high quality and security protocols, and complex packaging materials flows.
Achievements:
•	Responsible for successfully designing complex end-to-end flows including Interfaces (Pick-to-Light), RF developments, Forms and PPF automated actions.
•	Complex ERP integration.
•	One of the core members of the main EWM team.
profile_positions.title: ASML Project | Senior EWM consultant at the new High-Tech warehouse project on EWM 9.5

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: McCoy | SCM Solution Expert

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Home & Garden Retailer | Provide a SAP Yard Logistics (YL) presentation and demo

profile_positions.description:
A Dutch retail company manufacturer wants to expand their business and product offerings. Their current complete warehouse solution has become too rigid and outdated.  Zain was responsible of delivering the outbound flow and presenting the total solution.
Achievements:
•	Complex inbound and outbound flows including VAS including Labels and forms.
•	Warehouse optimizations and monitoring.
•	Picking optimization and exception handling in RF and by Pick by Cart.
•	Returnable packaging solution for inbound and outbound.
profile_positions.title: Office supplies & books Retailer | Advisory services and End-2-End solution demo

profile_positions.description:
The manufacturer was struggling with their inefficient warehouse and WM solution.  Zain was responsible of delivering and successfully presenting the total solution that included specific requirements aimed at tackling their biggest obstacles within their logistical processes.
Achievements:
•	Batch management and customer specific expiration date requirements.
•	Warehouse optimizations and monitoring.
•	Picking optimization and RF.
•	Shipment integration & Returnable packaging solution.
profile_positions.title: Potato Manufacturer | PoC for EWM implementation with SAP S/4 EWM 1909

profile_positions.description:
In this greenfield S/4 project with embedded EWM & TM, Zain was responsible for the overall EWM solution, where he, together with an EWM team of 4, implemented and improved many solutions and lifted the overall solution to a higher standard.
Achievements:
•	The tight integration with an external picking system with pick carts and set up of different kinds of scanners.
•	An End-to-End solution for managing, receiving, and picking returnable packaging materials. 
•	Custom RF designs and optimizations.
•	Implementing the many complex outbound flows including wave management with very high volumes and custom logics.
profile_positions.title: Smeding project | EWM Solution Architect for SAP S/4 1909 Implementation with embedded EWM & TM.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Smeding project | EWM Consultant for project Breda for SAP S/4 1909 implementation.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Food processing company | RF implementation advice

profile_positions.description:
Achievements:
•	Simplifying the feed sales process with an end-to-end solution within RF, that results in accurate track and tracing on batch level and a substantial decrease in manual labor required for that process.
•	Increasing stock accuracy and postings by introducing monitoring and error-handling solutions, which decreased "ghost stock" dramatically.
•	Introducing shipments integration solution with EWM for the outbound process.
•	Optimizing several RF scanner functionalities and transactions.
•	Optimized and simplified internal goods movement flows, including automated plant-to-plant postings, production returns, quality processes, and exception flows.
profile_positions.title: Ausnutria | EWM Solution Lead at Project Phase B.

profile_positions.description:
Achievements:
•	Warehouse design with sophisticated goods movement flows and integration to several plants.
•	Successfully implemented an automated warehouse solution (WCU interfaces) that managed the high bay storage for up to 20 000 pallets.
•	Integration with two Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) to accurately manage production stock and stock postings for different plants.
•	Designing end-to-end processes in close engagement with the business, which resulted in a first-time right approach and very close integration with different SAP modules (MM, PP-PI, LE, SD).
profile_positions.title: Ausnutria Project | EWM Solution Lead at Project Green - Automated High Bay.

profile_positions.description:

•	Optimizing production postings and movements to and from the supply areas using the EWM Advanced Production Integration.
•	Re-design the RF handheld transaction (ITS) to fit the business needs.
profile_positions.title: Ausnutria Project | EWM Solution Lead at Project SAP Leeuwarden.

profile_positions.description:
